title: Robotics Consulting
shortDescription: Expert guidance on robotics system architecture and implementation.
fullDescription: Comprehensive consulting services for companies looking to develop or integrate robotics solutions. From concept to deployment, I help teams make informed technical decisions.

title: Custom Robot Development
shortDescription: End-to-end development of specialized robotic systems.
fullDescription: Design and build custom robotic solutions tailored to your specific needs. From AMRs to manipulation systems, I deliver production-ready robotics platforms.

title: Technical Training
shortDescription: Hands-on workshops and courses in robotics and automation.
fullDescription: Educational programs designed for engineering teams looking to upskill in robotics technologies. Customized curriculum based on your team's needs and goals.
